fields.helpText: It's on your xxxx, It's x digits, for example 01/02/2015

sections.title: Are you and your organisation financially viable?

fields.infoText:
For example, do you have the finance available to achieve the aims and objectives of the statement of purpose?

Local authorities do not need to supply this information

sections.title: My organisation and I are financially viable

fields.label: How can you prove your financial viability?
fields.helpText: You need to provide examples where appropriate

sections.title: My organisation and I are not financially viable

fields.label: Can you provide more detail?
fields.infoText:
We are unlikely to accept your application to register if the establishment or agency has ceased to be financially viable, or is likely to cease to be so within the next six months.

Do not include personal or financial information, like your national insurance number or credit card details.

sections.title: Have you (or has your organisation) ever had an application refused or a registration cancelled?

fields.infoText: Only answer 'Yes' if this happened under any of the following acts:

fields.helpText: Tell us about any that apply

fields.label: I have had an application refused or a registration cancelled

sections.title: Tell us about the previous refused application or cancelled registration.

fields.infoText: * explain why we are asking for this detail *

fields.label: Ofsted registration number
fields.helpText: If you do not have it's Ofsted URN you can phone us on 0300 123 1231

fields.label: Organisation ID
fields.helpText: For example, a Companies house registration number

fields.label: What details do I need to provide?
fields.infoText:
You need to provide full details. For example:

* details of the previous application or registration, including information about the type of service provided

* the dates of application or registration

* reasons why the application was refused or the registration was cancelled

* whether this was by Ofsted or by another organisation

* any other detail you think is relevant

sections.title: About individuals who are part of the individual provider

** Explain why we're asking this info **  

For example, we need to know about each individual so we can check their eligibility to be an individual provider.

sections.title: Do the premises require planning permission?
Have you obtained the required planning permission? Or do you have evidence from the local authority to confirm that planning permission is not required?

fields.label: What evidence should I provide?
fields.infoText:
You need to provide either:

* copy of planning permission granted

* certificate of lawfulness

* copy of a planning application

* evidence that planning permission is not required

choices: Yes I will upload a copy
Yes I will post a copy

fields.infoText:
You need to post the document(s) with a cover note that states details of your application (for example, name, address) to:



Applications team

Osted

Piccadilly Gate

Store Street

Manchester

M1 2WD

fields.label: Upload your planning document here
fields.helpText: We accept files up to 5mb  in size if formats like .jpg, .gif, .xml

sections.title: What type of establishment is your children's home?

choices: Refuge under section 51 of the Children Act 1989
Residential special school (accommodating any child for more than 295 days a year)
Boarding school (other than a special school) accommodating any child for more than 295 days a year
Children's home (not in any of the other types above)

sections.title: How many children's homes do you want to register?
Will the home be single sex occupancy?
What is the maximum number of children in each category specified in the Care Standards Act in line with your statement of purpose?

fields.label: Children with emotional or behavioural difficulties
Children with mental disorders, not including learning disabilities
Children with hearing or eyesight difficulties (sensory impairment)

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
First name
fields.errorMessage: First name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Last name
fields.errorMessage: Last name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Status
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary
fields.errorMessage: Position in the company can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: To receive confirmation that your return has been submitted, enter an email address below
Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com
